headline: India’s Next Favourite Streetwear Brand
tagline: Born online. Built for hustle. Backed by the boldest fits this side of the internet.
about: We started with 10 t-shirts and a dream — and now we’re here, building a brand that blends Indian roots with global streetwear vibes. From drop culture to DMs, we create fashion that talks — literally (just check our hoodies). Made for the youth, by the youth. Every thread is stitched with hustle, memes, and a bit of caffeine-fueled chaos.

services.name: Unisex T-Shirts & Oversized Fits
services.description: All-season, all-attitude. Printed and shipped pan-India.

services.name: Limited Edition Drops
services.description: Hyped designs, surprise collabs, and weekly drops that disappear faster than your Swiggy order.

services.name: Custom Merch for Startups & Creators
services.description: Got a brand? Let’s make it wearable. From 20 to 2000 pieces — fully customizable.

services.name: Pop-Up Booth Experiences
services.description: Coming soon to your college fest, sneaker convention, or local weekend bazaar.

services.name: Style Chat Support
services.description:
Got sizing doubts? Want to know if that neon hoodie screams “Main Character”?
Our in-house fashion squad is one message away — real people, no bots, just style help with swag.

services.name: Loyalty Perks & Cashback
services.description: Earn while you drip. Every purchase gets you points, and every point gets you closer to exclusive drops, cashback, and surprise merch delivered to your door.

testimonials.quote: We sold out 80 tees in 3 days just through our college fest. Their design, website, and Insta strategy made us look like pros — even when we were still packing orders from our PG.
testimonials.name: Pranay Jindal
testimonials.title: Campus Ambassador

testimonials.quote: We thought we needed just a logo. Ended up with a whole brand kit, a stunning website, and customers asking, ‘Are you funded?’ These guys turned our garage idea into an Instagram-worthy movement.
testimonials.name: Aastha Verma
testimonials.title: Co-founder

testimonials.quote: They got our food ordering website live in 72 hours flat. Added online payments, spicy branding, and helped us rank on Google Maps — faster than our biryani delivery 🚀.
testimonials.name: Harshit Trivedi
testimonials.title: Solo Founder

testimonials.quote: I used the chat to ask if the oversized tee would still look oversized on my 5'1 frame — got a fun, honest reply in 3 minutes (and a styling tip too). Plus, I’ve already unlocked ₹300 in perks. Their loyalty game is as strong as their fits!
testimonials.name: Rhea Malhotra
testimonials.title: Repeat Buyer & Hoodie Hoarder
